00041 {

00046 void CHPDataTest::FilenameTest()
00047 {
00048         CHPData data;
00049 
00050         data.SetFilename("CHPData");
00051         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == "CHPData");
00052 }

00054 void CHPDataTest::SetEntryCountTest()
00055 {
00056         CHPData data("CHPData", CHP_EXPRESSION_ASSAY_TYPE);
00057 
00058         u_int32_t p1 = 100;
00059         data.SetEntryCount(p1, false);
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00061 }

00063 void CHPDataTest::ArrayTypeTest()
00064 {
00065         CHPData data;
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(data.SetArrayType(L"coolio"));
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"coolio");
00068 }

00070 void CHPDataTest::AlgParamTest()
00071 {
00072         CHPData data;
00073         data.AddAlgParam(L"param1", L"value");
00074         data.AddAlgParam(L"param1", 1);
00075         data.AddAlgParam(L"param1", 1.0f);
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00077 }
00078 
00079 void CHPDataTest::ChipSumTest()
00080 {
00081         CHPData data;
00082         data.AddChipSum(L"param1", L"value");
00083         data.AddChipSum(L"param2", 1);
00084         data.AddChipSum(L"param3", 123.321f);
00085 
00086         ParameterNameValueType p = data.GetChipSum(L"param1");
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.GetName() == L"param1");
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.GetValueText() == L"value");
00089 
00090         p = data.GetChipSum(L"param2");
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.GetName() == L"param2");
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.GetValueInt32() == 1);
00093 
00094         p = data.GetChipSum(L"param3");
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.GetName() == L"param3");
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.GetValueFloat(), 123.321, 0.001f);
00097 }
00098
